name: Baffin Mustang Winter Boots - Children to Youths
description: From treks to the toboggan hill, to snowshoe outings with the family, these classic kids' boots keep feet comfortable and warm.Uppers are 900-denier double-weave nylon with seam-sealed and waterproof construction.Toggle closure at top helps keep snow out.Single Velcro® closure at ankle for secure fit and easy adjustment.Plush seven-layer inner liner is removable and keeps feet warm.Midsoles and lower shells are made of flexible, light, thermoplastic rubber.Outsoles are lugged TPR rubber for good traction on slippery terrain.
